name: Celebright
0:
”“Alexa, turn Outdoor Lights on to white””
”“Alexa, dim Backyard Lights by 20%””
”“Alexa, turn Fence Lights off””
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Celebright skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Celebright lights using your voice. The Celebright skill allows you to turn your lights on/off, set the color and the brightness. Select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App to link your Celebright account and discover your device(s).

Use the name(s) you set up already for your devices to control your lights. You can change the name(s) of your lights in the Celebright app.

For example, if your Celebright light system for the back your home is named “Backyard” you could use the following commands:
“Alexa, turn Backyard lights on”
“Alexa, turn Backyard lights to blue”
“Alexa, dim Backyard lights by 20%”

If you have multiple Celebright light systems, for example a front, rear deck and fence, you can create a group and add one or more devices to the group to control all devices in the group with one command. For example, if your group was named “Outdoor Lights” you could use the following commands:
“Alexa, turn Outdoor Lights on to white”
“Alexa, set brightness of Outdoor Lights to 100%”
“Alexa, turn Outdoor Lights off”
